item.title: Language Diary 3: Now with tracked time data!
item.description: Lots of German! Also: I finally found a way to track my language learning time consistently.

item.title: How to automatically track language learning time using iOS automations
item.description: You can use iOS automations to automatically start and stop time tracking apps like Toggl when you open and close language learning apps â€” and much more!
